title: High Temperature Polymer Flooding in Thick Reservoir in ShuangHe Oilfield
abstract: High Temperature Polymer Flooding in Thick Reservoir in ShuangHe Oilfield Jinsong He; Jinsong He HeNan Petroleum Exploration Bureau (HPEB) Search for other works by this author on: This Site Google Scholar ZhenYu Song; ZhenYu Song HeNan Petroleum Exploration Bureau (HPEB) Search for other works by this author on: This Site Google Scholar Ling Qiu; Ling Qiu HeNan Petroleum Exploration Bureau (HPEB) Search for other works by this author on: This Site Google Scholar Feng Xie; Feng Xie HeNan Petroleum Exploration Bureau (HPEB) Search for other works by this author on: This Site Google Scholar ZhongLiang Tan; ZhongLiang Tan HeNan Petroleum Exploration Bureau (HPEB) Search for other works by this author on: This Site Google Scholar QingShang Yue; QingShang Yue Petroleum Exploration and Development Science Research Institute of CNPC Search for other works by this author on: This Site Google Scholar XiuNing Li XiuNing Li Petroleum Exploration and Development Science Research Institute of CNPC Search for other works by this author on: This Site Google Scholar Paper presented at the SPE International Oil and Gas Conference and Exhibition in China, Beijing, China, November 1998. Paper Number: SPE-50933-MS https://doi.org/10.2118/50933-MS Published: November 02 1998 Cite View This Citation Add to Citation Manager Share Icon Share Twitter LinkedIn Get Permissions Search Site Citation He, Jinsong, Song, ZhenYu, Qiu, Ling, Xie, Feng, Tan, ZhongLiang, Yue, QingShang, and XiuNing Li. "High Temperature Polymer Flooding in Thick Reservoir in ShuangHe Oilfield." Paper presented at the SPE International Oil and Gas Conference and Exhibition in China, Beijing, China, November 1998. doi: https://doi.org/10.2118/50933-MS Download citation file: Ris (Zotero) Reference Manager EasyBib Bookends Mendeley Papers EndNote RefWorks BibTex Search Dropdown Menu nav search search input Search input auto suggest search filter All ContentAll ProceedingsSociety of Petroleum Engineers (SPE)SPE International Oil and Gas Conference and Exhibition in China Search Advanced Search AbstractShuanghe oilfield is characterized by high temperature, serious heterogeneity and thick reservoir. This paper firstly describes the fine characterization techniques of thick reservoir, including geologic features, microfacies of sedimentation, heterogeneity and hydrodynamic unit analysis, and then introduces the study of thermal-oxidative stability of polymers by adding stabilizers. Finally it summarizes the optimized design and effectiveness of high-temperature (72 C) polymer flooding pilot test in layer II 5, Shuanghe oilfield, where oil recovery is increased by 10.4%.P. 533 Keywords: flooding, chemical flooding methods, shuanghe oilfield, stability, thick reservoir, oil production, oxygen content, high temperature polymer flooding, microfacies, society of petroleum engineers Subjects: Improved and Enhanced Recovery, Chemical flooding methods This content is only available via PDF. 1998.
